nodes.text: Leesa One-Eye was a one-eyed Human female who served as the Chief of Security for the Off-Worlders' Quarter on the planet Ropagi II during the early years of the New Republic. Born on a backwater planet, Leesa left her homeworld to become a free-trader until a run in with Imperial Customs. The customs official deliberately injured her left eye with a blade. Leesa left the free-trader life and traveled to Ropagi II to work as hired security.
